title: DevDeck
description: A comprehensive coding practice platform similar to NeetCode, featuring structured problem sets, progress tracking, and interactive coding challenges.

title: Health Me
description: An all-in-one health tracker with custom NLP model for intelligent health insights, meal tracking, and fitness monitoring.

title: Gen-Visa
description: A website utilizing VISA design tools with generative output suggestions and prompt generator for creative visa designs.

title: Movie App
description: A React.js Movie App offering users a seamless experience to discover and view movie posters with search functionality.

title: Weather App
description: A React.js Weather App providing users with up-to-date weather forecasts and information based on location.

title: QR Code Generator
description: A React.js project implementing a QR code generator, allowing users to dynamically create QR codes for various purposes.

title: BookYourTravel
description: A visually appealing travel landing page serving as a practical example for learning modern web development technologies.

title: Andy Llerena Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experience as a full stack engineer.

title: CareBook
description: A responsive healthcare management system allowing patients to register, book, and manage appointments while administrators oversee scheduling.
